IMPORTANT
[Dear . One quick note about this journal before it is read. Since this is a shared rp journal between Lida and Hitsugi, that means that some of the entries won't correspond with other another. Heres the deal: 1.All entries marked with Lida's icon (Hint: Bright orange hair) correspond to Lida's entries. 2.All marked otherwise correspond to Hitsugi's journal entries. 3.**Neither man is aware of the other, and have NO connection whatsoever, so therefore this journal is essentially two rp journals mashed into one.** Thank you. <3 Also. This journal is FRIENDS ONLY. <3 Comment to be added.
]
